# Schedule Network Diagram

**Generated by Requirements Gathering Agent v2.0.0**  
**Category:** planning-artifacts  
**Generated:** 2025-06-02T23:30:54.358Z  
**Description:** PMBOK Schedule Network Diagram

---

```mermaid
flowchart TD
  %% Define activities as nodes with IDs and labels
  A[Project Charter]
  B[Stakeholder Register]
  C[Scope Management Plan]
  D[Requirements Management Plan]
  E[Schedule Management Plan]
  F[Cost Management Plan]
  G[Quality Management Plan]
  H[Resource Management Plan]
  I[Communications Management Plan]
  J[Risk Management Plan]
  K[Procurement Management Plan]
  L[Stakeholder Engagement Plan]
  M[Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)]
  N[WBS Dictionary]
  O[Activity List]
  P[Activity Duration Estimates]
  Q[Activity Resource Estimates]
  R[Schedule Network Diagram]
  S[Milestone List]
  T[Technology Stack Analysis]
  U[Risk Analysis]
  V[Compliance Considerations]
  W[UI/UX Considerations]

  %% Initiating Phase
  A --> B
  A --> C
  A --> J

  %% Planning Phase Management Plans depend on Project Charter
  C --> D
  C --> E
  C --> F
  C --> G
  C --> H
  C --> I
  C --> K
  C --> L

  %% Detailed Planning Artifacts depend on various Management Plans
  D --> M
  M --> N
  M --> O

  O --> P
  O --> Q
  O --> R

  R --> S

  %% Analysis & Considerations can be concurrent but use info from Initiating and Planning
  T --> C
  U --> J
  V --> C
  W --> C

  %% Notes:
  %% - Project Charter (A) is the starting point
  %% - Stakeholder Register (B) supports Scope and Stakeholder Engagement
  %% - Risk Management Plan (J) is linked from Project Charter and Risk Analysis (U)
  %% - Schedule Network Diagram (R) depends on Activity List (O), Duration (P), Resource (Q)
  %% - Milestone List (S) depends on Schedule Network Diagram (R)

  style A fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
  style B fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
  style C fill:#fbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px

  %% Legend
  subgraph Legend
    direction LR
    L1[Initiating Process Group]:::init --> L2[Planning Process Group - Management Plans]:::plan
    L2 --> L3[Planning Process Group - Detailed Artifacts]:::detail
    L4[Analysis & Considerations]:::analysis
  end

  classDef init fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
  classDef plan fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
  classDef detail fill:#ffb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
  classDef analysis fill:#bdf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
```

This Mermaid diagram models the PMBOK Schedule Network Diagram for your project documentation generator, showing activities and their dependencies across Initiating and Planning process groups including management plans, detailed planning artifacts, and analysis considerations.
